name: Loza & Loza
overview:
Loza & Loza, an Intellectual Property Solutions Group, is a full-service California intellectual property law firm with attorneys specializing in the following areas:

Patents
Trademarks
Copyrights
Internet Law
Technology Counseling & Licensing
IP Litigation
Trade Secrets
Ebay Disputes

We work closely with our clients to develop strong intellectual property portfolios, protect their ideas, trademarks, and slogans, and provide logical, straightforward solutions for all intellectual property issues. At Loza & Loza, we are committed to helping clients obtain rights to their revolutionary ideas and vigorously enforce these rights against infringers.

website: www.lozaip.com email: inquiries@lozaip.com phone: 877-406-5164
